channel.title: How do i script and code my server source?
channel.description: like npcs, walls, stores, what npc's say, store names, price, commands, and stuff like that? but the main thing i want to know how to do is code commands. help!!! :confused:

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

omg ffs ownd:

!= does not mean “equal to”

Um he doesn’t have to worry about the ‘EXACT’ definition of what all the symbols mean… == and != are almost the same… Doesn’t matter what u use…

item.source: How do i script and code my server source?

item.title: How do i script and code my server source?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Search for

public void customcommand(String command) {

You will see soemthing like…

	public void customCommand(String command) {
		actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
command.replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
command.trim();

Add it underneath command.trim(); …

Some examples… Taken from above.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR COMMAND") && playerRights == PLAYERRIGHTS) {
addItem(ITEMID, AMOUNT);
sendMessage("MESSAGE HERE");
}

The sign inbetween playerRights and PLAYERRIGHTS…

== = Equal to obviously…

= = Equal to, or more.

<= = Equal to, or less.

!= = Equal to…

Thats all u need to know for basix.

YOUR COMMAND = The command name…
PLAYERRIGHTS = The player rights of the player, 0 = normal player, 1 = mod, 2 = mod, 3 = owner…
ITEMID = Item id…
AMOUNT = Amount of the item added to inventory…
MESSAGE = Your message.

You can use that… To add XP to a command.

addSkillXP(XP AMOUNT, SKILLNUM);

XP AMOUNT = The amount of XP added to SKILLNUM.

SKILLNUM = Skill number
0 = Attack
1 = Strength
2 = Defence
3 = HP
4 = Range
5 = Prayer
6 = Magic…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i script and code my server source?
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

sec ill help making stores

to add a store go into client and search for wanneshop = 2; add this

else if (NPCID == *NPCID) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = (NUMBER); right after the “}” below “wanneshop = 2;”
^ scroll down to the bottom of the wanneshop list to find the next number you should use.

then go to shops.cfg(in cfg folder) and go to the bottom of the list and add "shop = (number) shop name 1 1 and all the items and amounts your gonna sell. then go to “autospawn.cfg” and add "spawn = npcid xcoords ycoords height rangex1 rangey1 rangex2 rangey2 walktype then a description of your shop…save…compile…DONE

Read full topic

item.title: How do i script and code my server source?
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

0.0…one at a time plz? :\ and to add a command type:

if(command.startsWith("yourcommand")) { addItem(ITEMID, amount); or addSkillXP(XPAMOUNT, STAT NUMBER); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2007, 11:46:49 AM[/size][hr]you could also do…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("yourcommand") && playerRights == *playerrights*) { addItem(ITEMID, amount); or addSkillXP(XPAMOUNT, STAT NUMBER); }
to make it for only certain players
